history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or walking directions
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER PPG Paints Arena
TTS Okay, going to ppg paints arena. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER CMU
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER at 2 p.m.
TTS Okay, travelling at 02:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes, please.
TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> You are now hearing the default Google directions, to hear a route in <break time='200ms'/> mobility mode, please say ALTERNATE ROUTE. <break time='800ms'/>The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 18 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER Yes Nexus.

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue at Craig Street </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER Yes, continue.

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 61C <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 5th avenue + Magee Street</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 2:04pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER Next Step
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 1 min to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 1001 Fifth avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER alternate route

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> You are now hearing the mobility wheelchair mode. <break time='800ms'/> The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 18 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Start at Carnegie Mellon University <break strength='strong'/> Go west on FORBES AVENUE toward SOUTH CRAIG STREET, and then cross the street at <break strength='weak'/>SOUTH CRAIG STREET </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER Next Step
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right on SOUTH CRAIG STREET </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right on FORBES AVENUE, and Finish at Forbes Ave at Craig Streeton the right </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER Yes, I seen you.

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 61C <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 5th avenue + Magee Street</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 2:04pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Start at 5th Ave + Magee Street<break strength='strong'/> Go west on 5TH AVENUE toward MAGEE STREET, and then cross the street at <break strength='weak'/>MAGEE STREET  </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Next Step
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Continue on 5TH AVENUE, and finish at PPG PAINTS AREN on the right </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER except
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
